description: Samsung Pass is a password manager that Samsung smartphone users can install on their phones. It allows users to store website and app login credentials, credit card information, and addresses, and use their fingerprint or iris to quickly enter that information in websites and apps.
Optionally, users can back up the information they've entered in Samsung Pass. To do so they:
This backs up the user's Samsung Pass data in an SPASS file. Because SPASS files are encrypted, they can be opened and used only with Samsung Pass.
